TEXT.English: You have escaped and regained control of %s1 territory. Now let's teach our enemies a lesson!
TEXT.Chinese: 你已爬出谷底并重掌%s1的统治权。现在好好给敌人们上一课！

TEXT.English: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to repurpose their Pagan Temple as a %s3.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1在%s2的传播导致市民们把他们的原始神庙转换为%s3.

TEXT.English: %s1 cities are about to declare their independence and break away from our civilization. Shall we let them go peacefully?
TEXT.Chinese: %s1人宣布独立建国并赶走了我们的驻军。我们要给予他们自由吗？

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]First to complete causes Anarchy for everyone working on the project
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]首先完成项目将会造成无政府状态

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of satellites is less than a fifth of its total specialist slots
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]只可以在卫星数量小于城市专家槽的1/5时加入城市

TEXT.English: Our artisans have created a total of %d1 [ICON_CULTURE] in our cities!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的工匠在我们的城市创造了总共 %d1 [ICON_CULTURE]！

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad per Military Unit Stationed in a City up to a Maximum of %D3
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]城市驻军一单位，提升%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad，上限为%D3

TEXT.English: A %s1 embassy has been established in
Destroy the city! Burn it all down!
A new civilization is being born
Our source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName has been exhausted!
TEXT.Chinese: Our source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName has been exhausted!

TEXT.English: % with %F1_RelIcon (State Religion) and Theology (Until Scientific Method)
TEXT.Chinese: % with %F1_RelIcon （国家宗教）和神学（直到科学方法）

TEXT.English: Sack the city! Take as much as you can!
TEXT.Chinese: 洗劫这座城市！能抢多少抢多少！

TEXT.English: Can build %d1 World Wonders per City
TEXT.Chinese: 每个城市能够建造%d1个世界奇观

TEXT.English: Cities in the area have joined our rising empire!
TEXT.Chinese: 一些地方的城市加入了我们正在崛起的帝国！

TEXT.English: You have captured %s1_CityName!!! What are your next orders for our troops?
TEXT.Chinese: 你占领了%s1_CityName!!!你希望保留它吗？

TEXT.English: Our traders sailing Dhows acquired %d1 [ICON_GOLD] for our treasury!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的商船商船为我们的财政部购买了%d1 [ICON_GOLD] ！
联合国第631号决议（全球政体-社会福利）

TEXT.English: The Mongol hordes have invaded %s1_civ_adjective territory!
TEXT.Chinese: 蒙古游牧部落入侵了%s1_civ_adjective领土!

TEXT.English: %s2_CityName has added [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT] to the Mars colony. What would you like to work on next?
TEXT.Chinese: %s2_CityName已完成了太空船组件――[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT]。下一个项目是什么？

TEXT.English: A vast army of Seljuk Turks has been spotted moving west across the Iranian Plateau!
TEXT.Chinese: 一支庞大的塞尔柱突厥军队正在向西横跨伊朗高原！

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]1 Free Technology From Your Current Or Earlier Eras

TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] 在首都，对于每个殖民地

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Income from [ICON_TRADE] with Defensive Pact partners
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% 来自防御协定盟友的收入 [ICON_TRADE]

TEXT.English: The generous people of %s2_city have donated massive famine relief to the starving people of %s4_city. This generous humanitarian effort has brought the two nations much closer together.
TEXT.Chinese: 来自%s2_city的慷慨捐赠帮助了大批面临饥荒的%s4_city居民，这次无私的人道主义行动大幅拉近了两国的关系。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Trade Route Yield per Culture Level

[ICON_BULLET]Founded when Christian civilizations control less than half of all Christian cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Alternately founded by the first civilization to build an Orthodox Cathedral without controlling the Orthodox holy city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]建立时基督教文明控制着少于一半的基督教城市[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]或者由一个不控制东正教圣城的文明建造东正教大教堂

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+4 Stability Points for each civilization starting point controlled
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每控制一个文明发源地稳定点数+4

TEXT.English: A %s1 %s2_UnitName has been intercepted by a %s3 SDI %s4!!!
TEXT.Chinese: 一颗 %s1 %s2_UnitName 已经被%s3 SDI %s4拦截!!!

TEXT.English: Which religion do you want to persecute in %s1?
TEXT.Chinese: 你想从%s1中移除哪种宗教？

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No Additional Income from Foreign Trade Routes
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num World Wonders with %s2_LevelName Culture[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]只可以建造%d1_Num个世界奇观，在%s2_LevelName文化[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num National Wonders with %s2_LevelName Culture[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]只可以建造%d1_Num个文明奇观，在%s2_LevelName文化[COLOR_REVERT]
革除%s1的教籍 (需要%d2票，总计%d3票)

TEXT.English: territory. Now let's teach our enemies a lesson!
TEXT.Chinese: 的统治权。现在好好给敌人上一课！

TEXT.English: A %s1 has been born after the construction of La Mezquita in %s2!
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s2年，一位%s1在科尔多瓦清真寺建成后诞生!

TEXT.English: Our success in completing the %s1 has caused great shock in the %s2 civilization, who were working on the same project!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们成功完成了%s1，并给了与我们竞争同一项目的%s2文明巨大的打击！

TEXT.English: Distribute %d1 gold and see that the city is spared.
TEXT.Chinese: 花费%d1黄金，尽快恢复秩序

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Converting to this religion requires controlling its holy city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]皈依这种宗教需要控制它的圣城

TEXT.English: Builds %d1_Mod%% Faster when already completed by another civilization
TEXT.Chinese: 当其他文明已经完成时，建造%d1_Mod%%更快
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change 每个核心城市赠送免费专家

TEXT.English: The spread of %s1 to our city of %s2 caused its citizens to abandon their Pagan Temple.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1在%s2的传播导致市民们放弃了他们的原始神庙

TEXT.English: %D1_Mod%%: for trading with Defensive Pact partner
TEXT.Chinese: %D1_Mod%%: 与防御协定伙伴的交易

TEXT.English: You have escaped and regained control of
[SPACE](%d2_num_bonus available - as much as needed for %s1_city)[SPACE]
Establish control and install a new governor.
TEXT.Chinese: 好啊！建立个新的地方政府...
收缴什一税(需要%d1票，总计%d2票)

TEXT.English: Can Spend Gold to Finish Military Unit Production in a City
TEXT.Chinese: 能够花费黄金来组建军事单位

TEXT.English: It's been a huge shock to our civilization to learn that %s1 has managed to complete the %s2 before we could!
TEXT.Chinese: 在得知%s1在我们之前就完成了%s2，这对我们的文明是个巨大的冲击！

TEXT.English: Your Holkan has defeated a %s1 %s2, acquiring %d3 [ICON_FOOD] for %s4.
TEXT.Chinese: 你的霍坎武士打败了 %s1 %s2, 获得 %d3 [ICON_FOOD] %s4.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2 additional Stability Points on city conquest
Send Inquisition to %s1 (Requires %d2 of %d3 Total Votes)
TEXT.Chinese: 对%s1发起宗教裁判 (需要%d2票，总计%d3票)

TEXT.English: We refused the flip, this means war!
TEXT.Chinese: 拒绝他们的要求，这意味着战争！

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%%F2 from State [ICON_RELIGION] and Theology (Until Scientific Method)
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%%F2 from 国家[ICON_RELIGION] 和神学（直到科学方法）
%s1的军队已经入侵了我国领土！

TEXT.English: You have pillaged %d1_Num [ICON_GOLD] from the capture of %s2_CityName!!! What are your next orders for our troops?
TEXT.Chinese: 你从占领的%s2_CityName掠夺到%d1_Num[ICON_GOLD]!!!你希望保留它吗？

TEXT.English: [H1]A new civilization is being born[\H1][NEWLINE]Do you wish to take permanent control of the %s1 civilization?
TEXT.Chinese: [H1]一个新的文明诞生了[\H1][NEWLINE]你愿意控制%s1文明吗？

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]1 Free Specialist in the Capital per Culture Level
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每个文化级别在首都提供1名免费专家

TEXT.English: You have acquired %d1 [ICON_GOLD] by sinking a %s2 %s3.
%s1_civ_adjective investments in horticulture have paid off! A new minor industry is thriving in %s2_city, boosting health and research.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective在医药方面的投资获得了回报！一项新兴特色产业正在%s2_city发展壮大，推进了民众健康和科研工作。

TEXT.English: UN Resolution - Free %s1_player from %s2_civ_adjective Control (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)
TEXT.Chinese: 联合国决议 - 让%s1_player从%s2_civ_adjective的附庸下独立(需要%d3_ReqNum，总计%d4_TotNum票)

TEXT.English: % with State [ICON_RELIGION] and Theology (Until Scientific Method)
TEXT.Chinese: % with 国家 [ICON_RELIGION] 和神学（直到科学方法）

TEXT.English: The generous people of %s2_city have donated famine relief to the endangered people of %s4_city. This humanitarian effort has brought the two nations closer together.
TEXT.Chinese: 来自%s2_city的慷慨捐赠挽救了许多濒临死亡的%s4_city居民，这次无私的人道主义行动拉近了两国的关系。

TEXT.English: Some of our enemy's forces are joining us to help our war of liberation!
TEXT.Chinese: 敌人的部分军队决定反戈一击，为我们的独立而战！

TEXT.English: Do you wish to take permanent control of the %s1 civilization?
TEXT.Chinese: 你是否希望接手控制%s1文明？

TEXT.English: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Our specialists increase the prestige of our city!"
TEXT.Chinese: %D1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: “入驻的大艺术家向我们提供各项娱乐！”

TEXT.English: The establishment of Academia has unleashed a wave of new doctrines. Protestant churches are opposing the power of the Pope over Christian affairs. Shall we embrace the Reformation? All our Catholic cities and buildings will be converted to the new religion. If we convert now, we will receive a bonus of 500 gold for rapidly taking control of Church assets.
TEXT.Chinese: 印刷机的发明已经推动了一波新的思潮。新教反对教皇在基督教内至高无上的权力。我们是否应该实施宗教改革？我们所有信仰天主教的城市将自动皈依新教。若我们现在实施改革，我们将迅速控制教会资产并获得500金币。

TEXT.English: %d1 out of %d2 non-obsolete World Wonders at %s3 culture
TEXT.Chinese: %s3文化程度下，%d1不满足建造奇观%d2

TEXT.English: Your Spy has reached the status of a Great Spy!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的间谍到达了大间谍的地位！

TEXT.English: A group of our own adventurers has arrived in the new world searching for wealth!
TEXT.Chinese: 地理大发现：我国的一支探险队已经抵达新大陆，寻找传说中的财富！

TEXT.English: A part of our population from %s1 is emigrating to the New World!
TEXT.Chinese: 我国%s1的部分人口移民新大陆！

TEXT.English: cities have declared independence from their foreign domination!
TEXT.Chinese: 一些城市宣布脱离外来统治独立建国！

TEXT.English: UN Resolution - Decolonize %s1_city (%s2_player) (Requires %d3_ReqNum of %d4_TotNum Total Votes)
TEXT.Chinese: 联合国决议 - 解放%s1_city (%s2_player) (需要%d3_ReqNum，总计%d4_TotNum票)
联合国第743号决议（全球政体-平等主义）

TEXT.English: Nationalism has changed the conception of armies: Mercenaries no longer fit in!
TEXT.Chinese: 民族主义的兴起改变了军队的构成：雇佣军已经不合时宜！

TEXT.English: You lack a state religion with religious goals!
TEXT.Chinese: 您的国教没有宗教胜利目标！

TEXT.English: After the discovery of %s1, your cities have received %d2 [ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.Chinese: 在发现了%s1之后, 你的城市得到了%d2[ICON_FOOD]

TEXT.English: You have been captured by the %s1:2 and exiled to the unimportant lands of %s2. You have a short period of time for retaking your capital and gain back your position.
TEXT.Chinese: 你已被%s1:2抓获并流放到偏远的%s2之地。你必须在短时间内夺回首都以恢复权力。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Provides clean Power ([ICON_CLEAN_POWER]) for All Cities on this Continent
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]为所在大陆的所有城市提供电力([ICON_POWER])
联合国第3345号决议（全球政体-民主制度）

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can convert production to commerce with %D1_Mod%% efficiency
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]能够将产能转换为贸易%D1_Mod%%效率

TEXT.English: An enemy unit has been enslaved!
Religious persecution in %s2 has removed %s1 from the city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s2的宗教审判把%s1从这座城市中移除。
瘟疫导致居民死亡，地点：
一个 %s1_UnitName加入了我们的军队

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] for having the current building in your capital

While Christianity has since its existence consisted of various sects, our central government could still uphold Christian Orthodoxy. But with worldly control over the Christian world fracturing, the Patriarch of %s1 has declared himself Pope and claims to be the sole representative of God on Earth. Now a theological schism divides Christianity, and several cities outside of our direct control have joined this new Catholic sect.
TEXT.Chinese: 天主教会已经存在了几个世纪了。然而，教皇声称自己是地球上神的唯一代表，这行为严重影响了我们的宗教权威。 他所诠释的上帝之道偏离了基督教的原始经典，这引起了我们文明的许多牧师的担忧。我们是否应该在宗教分裂中脱离天主教会并且皈依东正教？

TEXT.English: . You have a short period of time for retaking your capital and gain back your position.
TEXT.Chinese: 。你必须在短时间内夺回首都以恢复权力。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No negative Stability Points for low amount of traded resources
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]交易资源减少时不降低稳定度

TEXT.English: Some of our forces are joining the enemy to help their war of liberation!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的部分军队加入了叛乱者，为他们的独立而战！

TEXT.English: [SPACE]per Specialist for every city that works at most %d1 land tiles
TEXT.Chinese: [SPACE]每个城市中的每个专家最多在%d1个地块上工作
文化控制：稳定度的扩张惩罚
联合国第413号决议（全球政体-多元主义）

TEXT.English: Removing a %s1 near your city of %s2 has created %d3 [ICON_GOLD] for your treasury.
TEXT.Chinese: 移除%s2附近的一处%s1，并为你的国库带来了%d3[ICON_GOLD]的收入。
联合国第427号决议（全球政体-世俗主义）

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Founded when a Hindu Temple is built
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]建成一座印度教神庙后创立
联合国第791号决议（全球政体-宪法制度）
[ICON_BULLET]每收纳一个附庸国稳定点数+4

TEXT.English: Conquerors from a far away continent are invading our lands searching for wealth!
TEXT.Chinese: 地理大发现：来自遥远大陆的征服者开始入侵我们的领土，疯狂掠取财富！

TEXT.English: You have been captured by the
There are new mercenaries available for hiring.
TEXT.Chinese: 有新的雇佣军可供征召。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Income from [ICON_TRADE] going through your Capital
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% 产生收入于 [ICON_TRADE] 经过你首都的

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]want to flip to a rising civilization. Our refusal may lead to a war and some of our troops may join it. Should we let them go?
TEXT.Chinese: [NEWLINE]一个渴求独立的新文明。如果我们拒绝可能导致战争的爆发及部分军队的叛离。我们要给予他们自由吗？

TEXT.English: Can build %d1 National Wonders per City
TEXT.Chinese: 每个城市能够建造%d1个文明奇观

TEXT.English: We have collected a tithe of %d1 from the Catholic world.
TEXT.Chinese: 我们自天主教国家%d1收取了什一税

TEXT.English: and exiled to the unimportant lands of
Cultural Control: severe expansion stability penalty
TEXT.Chinese: 文化控制：严重的稳定度扩张惩罚

TEXT.English: Double Production Speed when already completed by another civilization
TEXT.Chinese: 当其他文明已经完成时，获得双倍产能

TEXT.English: The trade passing through our waters brings %d1 [ICON_GOLD] to our treasury!
TEXT.Chinese: 水路贸易让我们带来了 %d1 [ICON_GOLD] !
对%s1_player发起十字军运动 (需要%d2_ReqNum票，总计%d3_TotNum票)

TEXT.English: As the Cradle of Civilization, we can choose another free technology:
TEXT.Chinese: 作为文明摇篮，我们可以选择一项免费科技：

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives [COLOR_TECH_TEXT] Free Technologies[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]率先发现者自动获得%d1_Num项[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]免费科技[COLOR_REVERT]从你现在或更早的时代当中
%D1_Mod%%: 与其他文明首都的交易

TEXT.English: Plague has killed our unit near
TEXT.Chinese: 瘟疫造成单位损失，地点：

TEXT.English: %s1 cities have declared their independence from their foreign domination!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1人宣布脱离外来统治独立建国！

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can join a city only if its number of slaves is less than half its population
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]只可以在奴隶人口小于城市一半人口时加入城市

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No more than one corporation per city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Post-communist crisis in case of economic system switch
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每座城市只能入驻一种公司[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]改变共产主义经济制度将导致经济危机

TEXT.English: Your persecutor has successfully purged %s2_religion from %s1_city and confiscated %d3_gold[ICON_GOLD] from the victims.
TEXT.Chinese: 你的宗教审判从%s1_city移除了%s2_religion，并且在异教徒处收取了%d3_gold[ICON_GOLD]
[ICON_BULLET]%D1%%%F2 来自宇宙飞船产能加成

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]First to Discover Receives a [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Free Technology[COLOR_REVERT] from your current or earlier Era
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]率先发现者获得一项[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]免费科技[COLOR_REVERT]从你现在或更早的时代当中

TEXT.English: The Mongol hordes have invaded our territory!
TEXT.Chinese: 蒙古游牧部落入侵了我国领土!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] in Capital for every Vassal City
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change[ICON_COMMERCE] 在首都，对于每个附庸城市

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%d1_Num Free Technologies From Your Current Or Earlier Eras

TEXT.Chinese: 你在%s1_city的宗教审判没有成功。

TEXT.English: Can Spend Gold to Finish Building Production in a City
TEXT.Chinese: 能够花费黄金来完成建筑生产

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2 additional Stability Points for each city founded at least 15 tiles from the capital
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每建立一个距离首都15格以上的城市时，稳定点数+2

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Missionaries cannot spread in civilizations that have a different state religion
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]传教士无法在具有不同国教的文明中传播

TEXT.English: The sun rises on the year %s1_year. The %s2_civ people are ready to settle down and found your first city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader, your people have vested absolute power in you, trusting that you can build a Civilization to stand the test of time!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_year年第一天的太阳已经升起。%s2_civ人民决定结束游牧生活，并为你建造一座城市。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader，你的人民愿意赋予你最高的权力。并坚信你能开创一个历久弥新的文明！

TEXT.English: %d1 out of %d2 National Wonders at %s3 culture
TEXT.Chinese: %s3文化程度下，%d1不满足建造民族奇观%d2

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]First to complete receives %s1 experience for Air units
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]率先完成将会使你的空军单位获得%s1经验
